meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>extinguish</kanji> an item and therefore have to <kanji>expense</kanji> it. This is how <vocabulary>consumption</vocabulary> works. Expense, extinguish, consumption.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
